Name: Ted
Message: Everyone comes with baggage. Find someone who loves you enough to help you unpack.

Name: Barney
Message: It's going to be legen-- wait for it-- and I hope you're not lactose intolerant, because the second half of the word is-- dary! Legendary!

Name: Robin
Message: Well, You're One-Quarter Canadian, So By That Logic You One-Quarter Suck.

Name: Marshall
Message: The Only Person Who Loves Ted Mosby More Than Marshall Eriksen, Is Drunk Marshall Eriksen!
